open, even by those with superior strength.

entries.red:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.
entries.blue:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.
entries.yellow:
Said to appear in
decrepit, deserted
buildings. It has no real shape as
it appears to be
made of a gas.
entries.gold:
With its gas-like
body, it can sneak
into any place it desires. However,
it can be blown
away by wind.
entries.silver:
Its thin body is
made of gas. It
can envelop an opponent of any
size and cause
suffocation.
entries.crystal:
It wraps its op­
ponent in its gas-
like body, slowly weakening its prey
by poisoning it
through the skin.
entries.ruby:
GASTLY is largely composed of gaseous
matter. When exposed to a strong wind,
the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this POKéMON cluster under
the eaves of houses to escape the
ravages of wind.
entries.sapphire:
GASTLY is largely composed of gaseous
matter. When exposed to a strong wind,
the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this POKéMON cluster under
the eaves of houses to escape the
ravages of wind.
entries.emerald:
When exposed to a strong wind, a GASTLY’s
gaseous body quickly dwindles away.
They cluster under the eaves of houses
to escape the ravages of wind.
entries.firered:
A being that exists as a thin gas. It can
topple an Indian elephant by enveloping
the prey in two seconds.
entries.leafgreen:
Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON
cloaks the target and puts it to sleep
without notice.
entries.diamond:
This Pokémon’s body is 95% made up
of gases, which are blown away by
strong gusts of wind.
entries.pearl:
A Pokémon born from poison gases.
It defeats even the largest foes
by enveloping them in gas.
entries.platinum:
Born from gases, anyone would
faint if engulfed by its gaseous
body, which contains poison.
entries.heartgold:
With its gas-like body, it can sneak
into any place it desires. However,
it can be blown away by wind.
entries.soulsilver:
Its body is made of gas. Despite lacking
substance, it can envelop an opponent
of any size and cause suffocation.
entries.black:
Born from gases, anyone would
faint if engulfed by its gaseous
body, which contains poison.
entries.white:
Born from gases, anyone would
faint if engulfed by its gaseous
body, which contains poison.

Born from gases, anyone would
faint if engulfed by its gaseous
body, which contains poison.
entries.white-2:

faint if engulfed by its gaseous
body, which contains poison.
entries.x:

entries.y:
Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by
its gaseous body, which contains poison.
entries.omega-ruby:
Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed
to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away.

entries.alpha-sapphire:
Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed
to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away.
Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to
escape the ravages of wind.
entries.sun:
Should a strange light be seen flickering
in an abandoned building, Gastly is lurking there.
entries.moon:
Although Gastly is barely visible, when it’s near,
a faint sweet smell lingers.
entries.ultra-sun:
It’s said that gas emanating from a graveyard
was possessed by the grievances of the
deceased and thus became a Pokémon.
entries.ultra-moon:
Poisonous gas comprises 95% of its body. It’s
said that the remaining 5% is made up of the
souls of those who died from the gas.
entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings.
It has no real shape, as it appears to be
made of a gas.
entries.lets-go-eevee:
Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings.
It has no real shape, as it appears to be
made of a gas.
entries.sword:
Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed
by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
entries.shield:
With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place
it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.
entries.legends-arceus:
Gaseous and completely impalpable. Also highly dangerous—
inhaling part of its poisonous body will cause one to
faint instantly.

entries.red:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.
entries.blue:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.
entries.yellow:
By licking, it
saps the victim's
life. It causes shaking that won't
stop until the
victim's demise.
entries.gold:
In total darkness,
where nothing is
visible, HAUNTER lurks, silently
stalking its next
victim.
entries.silver:
Its tongue is made
of gas. If licked,
its victim starts shaking constantly
until death even­
tually comes.
entries.crystal:
It hides in the
dark, planning to
take the life of the next living
thing that wanders
close by.
entries.ruby:
HAUNTER is a dangerous POKéMON.
If one beckons you while floating in
darkness, you must never approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its
tongue and steal your life away.
entries.sapphire:
HAUNTER is a dangerous POKéMON.
If one beckons you while floating in
darkness, you must never approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its
tongue and steal your life away.
entries.emerald:
If a HAUNTER beckons you while it is
floating in darkness, don’t approach it.
This POKéMON will try to lick you with its
tongue and steal your life away.
entries.firered:
If you get the feeling of being watched
in darkness when nobody is around,
HAUNTER is there.
entries.leafgreen:
Because of its ability to slip through
block walls, it is said to be from another
dimension.
entries.diamond:
It can slip through any obstacle.
It lurks inside walls to keep an
eye on its foes.
entries.pearl:
It licks with its gaseous tongue
to steal the victim’s life force.
It lurks in darkness for prey.
entries.platinum:
It likes to lurk in the dark and tap
shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its
touch causes endless shuddering.
entries.heartgold:
In total darkness, where nothing is
visible, HAUNTER lurks, silently
stalking its next victim.
entries.soulsilver:
Its tongue is made of gas. If licked,
its victim starts shaking constantly
until death eventually comes.
entries.black:
It likes to lurk in the dark and tap
shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its
touch causes endless shuddering.
entries.white:

shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its
touch causes endless shuddering.

entries.x:
If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness

entries.y:
It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim’s
life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.
entries.omega-ruby:
Haunter is a dangerous Pokémon. If one beckons you while
floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This Pokémon
will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
entries.alpha-sapphire:
Haunter is a dangerous Pokémon. If one beckons you while
floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This Pokémon
will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
entries.sun:
It strikes at humans from total darkness.
Those licked by its cold tongue grow weaker
with each passing day until they die.
entries.moon:
It fears the light and revels in the dark. It may
be on the verge of extinction in cities that stay
brightly lit at night.
entries.ultra-sun:
On moonless nights, Haunter searches for
someone to curse, so it’s best not to go out
walking around.
entries.ultra-moon:
It’s dangerous to go outside alone on nights
when you’re feeling sad. Haunter will catch you,
and you won’t be able to go back home.
entries.lets-go-pikachu:
By licking, it saps the victim’s life. It causes
shaking that won’t stop until the victim’s demise.
entries.lets-go-eevee:
By licking, it saps the victim’s life. It causes
shaking that won’t stop until the victim’s demise.
entries.sword:
Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim
starts shaking constantly until death
eventually comes.
entries.shield:
If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness
when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
entries.legends-arceus:
This frightful, malevolent spirit can glide through walls,
appearing wherever it likes. According to rumor, victims of
a Haunter's lick will wither to death day by day.

entries.red:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.
entries.blue:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.
entries.yellow:
A GENGAR is close
by if you feel a
sudden chill. It may be trying
to lay a curse
on you.
entries.gold:
It steals heat
from its surround­
ings. If you feel a sudden chill, it
is certain that a
GENGAR appeared.
entries.silver:
To steal the life
of its target, it
slips into the prey's shadow and
silently waits for
an opportunity.
entries.crystal:
Hiding in people's
shadows at night,
it absorbs their heat. The chill it
causes makes the
victims shake.
entries.ruby:
Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow
thrown by a streetlight will suddenly
and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past
you, pretending to be your shadow.
entries.sapphire:
Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow
thrown by a streetlight will suddenly
and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past
you, pretending to be your shadow.
entries.emerald:
Deep in the night, your shadow cast by
a streetlight may suddenly overtake you.
It is actually a GENGAR running past
you, pretending to be your shadow.
entries.firered:
It is said to emerge from darkness to
steal the lives of those who become lost
in mountains.
entries.leafgreen:
On the night of a full moon, if shadows
move on their own and laugh, it must be
GENGAR’s doing.
entries.diamond:
It hides in shadows. It is said
that if GENGAR is hiding, it cools
the area by nearly 10 degrees F.
entries.pearl:
Lurking in the shadowy corners
of rooms, it awaits chances to
steal its prey’s life force.
entries.platinum:
The leer that floats in darkness
belongs to a GENGAR delighting in
casting curses on people.
entries.heartgold:
It steals heat from its surroundings.
If you feel a sudden chill,
it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.
entries.soulsilver:
To steal the life of its target, it
slips into the prey’s shadow and
silently waits for an opportunity.
entries.black:
The leer that floats in darkness
belongs to a Gengar delighting in
casting curses on people.
entries.white:
The leer that floats in darkness
belongs to a Gengar delighting in
casting curses on people.
entries.black-2:
The leer that floats in darkness
belongs to a Gengar delighting in
casting curses on people.
entries.white-2:
The leer that floats in darkness
belongs to a Gengar delighting in
casting curses on people.
entries.x:
It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar
is hiding, it cools the area by nearly
10 degrees Fahrenheit.
entries.y:
Hiding in people’s shadows at night, it absorbs their
heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
entries.omega-ruby:
Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a
streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you.
It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be
your shadow.
entries.alpha-sapphire:
Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a
streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you.
It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be
your shadow.
entries.sun:
Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden
chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar.
There is no escaping it. Give up.
entries.moon:
It apparently wishes for a traveling companion.
Since it was once human itself, it tries to create
one by taking the lives of other humans.
entries.ultra-sun:
You can hear tales told all over the world about
how Gengar will pay a visit to children who
are naughty.
entries.ultra-moon:
Even your home isn’t safe. Gengar will lurk in
whatever dark corner of a room it can find and
wait for its chance to catch its prey.
entries.lets-go-pikachu:
A Gengar is close by if you feel a sudden chill.
It may be trying to lay a curse on you.
entries.lets-go-eevee:
A Gengar is close by if you feel a sudden chill.
It may be trying to lay a curse on you.
entries.sword:
On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on
their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.
entries.shield:
It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the
lives of those who become lost in mountains.
entries.legends-arceus:
Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away
the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take
hold of a protective charm posthaste!

entries.red:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.
entries.blue:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.
entries.yellow:
Burrows at high
speed in search
of food. The tunnels it leaves
are used as homes
by DIGLETTs.
entries.gold:
It twists and
squirms through
the ground. The thunderous roar of
its tunneling
echoes a long way.
entries.silver:
It rapidly bores
through the ground
at 50 mph by squirming and
twisting its mas­
sive, rugged body.
entries.crystal:
As it digs through
the ground, it
absorbs many hard objects. This is
what makes its
body so solid.
entries.ruby:
ONIX has a magnet in its brain. It acts
as a compass so that this POKéMON does
not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes
increasingly rounder and smoother.
entries.sapphire:
ONIX has a magnet in its brain. It acts
as a compass so that this POKéMON does
not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes
increasingly rounder and smoother.
entries.emerald:
There is a magnet in its brain that
prevents an ONIX from losing direction
while tunneling. As it grows older, its body
becomes steadily rounder and smoother.
entries.firered:
It usually lives underground. It searches
for food while boring its way through the
ground at 50 miles per hour.
entries.leafgreen:
As it grows, the stone portions of its
body harden to become similar to
black-colored diamonds.
entries.diamond:
When it travels underground, it
causes rumbling and tremors.
It can move at 50 mph.
entries.pearl:
It squirms through the ground
using its long and rugged body.
It always eats while burrowing.
entries.platinum:
It burrows through the ground
at a speed of 50 mph while
feeding on large boulders.
entries.heartgold:
It twists and squirms through
the ground. The thunderous roar of
its tunneling echoes a long way.
entries.soulsilver:

at 50 mph by squirming and

feeding on large boulders.
entries.black-2:
Opening its large mouth, it ingests
massive amounts of soil and creates
long tunnels.
entries.white-2:
Opening its large mouth, it ingests

long tunnels.

entries.lets-go-eevee:

As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many
hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
entries.shield:
It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by
squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.
entries.legends-arceus:
This chain of immense stones resembles a giant serpent. Tremors
shake the earth above as it burrows deep beneath the ground,
feeding on boulders as it goes.

entries.red:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.
entries.blue:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.
entries.yellow:
If you sleep by
it all the time,
it will sometimes show you dreams
it has eaten in
the past.
entries.gold:
If you think that
you had a good
dream, but you can't remember it,
a DROWZEE has
probably eaten it.
entries.silver:
It remembers every
dream it eats. It
rarely eats the dreams of adults
because children's
are much tastier.
entries.crystal:
When it twitches
its nose, it can
tell where someone is sleeping and
what that person
is dreaming about.
entries.ruby:
If your nose becomes itchy while you
are sleeping, it’s a sure sign that one
of these POKéMON is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream
through your nostrils.
entries.sapphire:
If your nose becomes itchy while you
are sleeping, it’s a sure sign that one
of these POKéMON is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream
through your nostrils.
entries.emerald:
If your nose becomes itchy while you are
sleeping, it’s a sure sign that a DROWZEE is
standing above your pillow and trying to
eat your dream through your nostrils.
entries.firered:
A descendent of the legendary animal
baku, which is said to eat dreams. It is
skilled at hypnotism.
entries.leafgreen:
Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their
dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating
only bad dreams.
entries.diamond:
It can tell what people are
dreaming by sniffing with its big
nose. It loves fun dreams.
entries.pearl:
It can tell what people are
dreaming by sniffing with its big
nose. It loves fun dreams.
entries.platinum:
It can tell what people are
dreaming by sniffing with its big

If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it’s a sure

entries.sun:
A Pokémon that nourishes itself by eating
dreams, it is thought to share common ancestry
with Munna and Musharna.
entries.moon:
It finds really fun dreams tasty. When it makes
friends with people, it may show them the most
delicious dreams it’s ever eaten.
entries.ultra-sun:
It can be spotted near recreational facilities,
intending to eat the pleasant dreams of children
who enjoyed themselves there that day.
entries.ultra-moon:
It puts its prey to sleep and devours their
dreams. It seems that bad dreams taste sour,
so Drowzee doesn’t particularly like eating them.
entries.lets-go-pikachu:
If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes
show you dreams it had eaten in the past.
entries.lets-go-eevee:
If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes
show you dreams it had eaten in the past.

entries.red:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.
entries.blue:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.
entries.yellow:
Avoid eye contact
if you come across
one. It will try to put you to
sleep by using
its pendulum.
entries.gold:
When it is very
hungry, it puts
humans it meets to sleep, then it
feasts on their
dreams.
entries.silver:
Always holding a
pendulum that it
rocks at a steady rhythm, it causes
drowsiness in any­
one nearby.
entries.crystal:
The longer it
swings its
pendulum, the longer the effects
of its hypnosis
last.
entries.ruby:
HYPNO holds a pendulum in its hand.
The arcing movement and glitter of the
pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis.
While this POKéMON searches for prey,
it polishes the pendulum.
entries.sapphire:
HYPNO holds a pendulum in its hand.
The arcing movement and glitter of the
pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis.
While this POKéMON searches for prey,
it polishes the pendulum.
entries.emerald:
The arcing movement and glitter of the
pendulum in a HYPNO’s hand lull the foe
into deep hypnosis. While searching for
prey, it polishes the pendulum.
entries.firered:
It carries a pendulum-like device. There
once was an incident in which it took 
away a child it hypnotized.
entries.leafgreen:
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will
use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS
and CONFUSION.
entries.diamond:
Seeing its swinging pendulum can
induce sleep in three seconds,
even in someone who just woke up.
entries.pearl:
Seeing its swinging pendulum can
induce sleep in three seconds,
even in someone who just woke up.
entries.platinum:
Seeing its swinging pendulum can
induce sleep in three seconds,
even in someone who just woke up.

humans it meets to sleep,
then it feasts on their dreams.
entries.soulsilver:

swings at a steady rhythm, it causes
drowsiness in anyone nearby.

Seeing its swinging pendulum can
induce sleep in three seconds,
even in someone who just woke up.
entries.white:

even in someone who just woke up.

Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and

entries.alpha-sapphire:
Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and

the pendulum.
entries.sun:
While it is an extremely dangerous Pokémon,
people who are in need of a good, sound sleep
call it their savior.
entries.moon:
As a matter of course, it makes anyone it meets
fall asleep and has a taste of their dreams.
Anyone having a good dream, it carries off.
entries.ultra-sun:
In Alola, Komala is Hypno’s main target. It rarely
harms people.
entries.ultra-moon:
There are some Hypno that assist doctors with
patients who can’t sleep at night in hospitals.
entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will
try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
entries.lets-go-eevee:
Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will
try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

entries.red:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.
entries.blue:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.
entries.yellow:
Its pincers are
superb weapons.
They sometimes break off during
battle, but they
grow back fast.
entries.gold:
If it senses dan­
ger approaching,
it cloaks itself with bubbles from
its mouth so it
will look bigger.
entries.silver:
The pincers break
off easily. If it
loses a pincer, it somehow becomes
incapable of walk­
ing sideways.
entries.crystal:
If it is unable
to find food, it
will absorb nutrients by
swallowing a
mouthful of sand.
entries.ruby:
KRABBY live on beaches, burrowed inside
holes dug into the sand.
On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these POKéMON can be seen
squabbling with each other over
territory.
entries.sapphire:
KRABBY live on beaches, burrowed inside
holes dug into the sand.
On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these POKéMON can be seen
squabbling with each other over
territory.
entries.emerald:
KRABBY live in holes dug into beaches.
On sandy shores with little in the way
of food, they can be seen squabbling with
each other over territory.
entries.firered:
It can be found near the sea. The large
pincers grow back if they are torn out of
their sockets.
entries.leafgreen:
Its pincers are not only powerful weapons,
they are used for balance when walking
sideways.
entries.diamond:
It lives in burrows dug on sandy
beaches. Its pincers fully grow
back if they are broken in battle.
entries.pearl:
It lives in burrows dug on sandy
beaches. Its pincers fully grow
back if they are broken in battle.
entries.platinum:
It lives in burrows dug on sandy
beaches. Its pincers fully grow
back if they are broken in battle.
entries.heartgold:
